attributes.action: the discrimination against people with Mental Health
attributes.background: So I have mental Health and I just feel that I get discriminated from participating in many things that “Normal people can do” this needs to change for the country’s sake it feels that nobody cares about us. I am trying my best to achieve the GCSES I need it needs to be addressed.

rejection.details:
We've marked this petition as confidential because of the personal information you've included. We were sorry to read about the difficulties you've been facing.

In any case, we can't accept your petition because we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are already some laws that protect people from being discriminated against because of mental health problems.

The Equality Advisory and Support Service may be able to give you some advice. 

You can find out more here:
http://www.equalityadvisoryservice.com/
